seadiver
Class PathDeviationMoverManager

java.lang.Object
  simkit.BasicSimEventSource
      simkit.BasicSimEntity
          simkit.SimEntityBase
              seadiver.PathDeviationMoverManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<simkit.SimEntity>, MoverManager, simkit.Named, simkit.PropertyChangeSource, simkit.SimEntity, simkit.SimEventListener, simkit.SimEventSource
public class PathDeviationMoverManager
extends simkit.SimEntityBase
implements MoverManager

A mover manager that gets inserted if a GPS fix is needed. The mover will stop and obtain a fix with a passed delay time then return to the MoverMangager in use before the detection.

Author:
Rick Goldberg, John Seguin (modified AvoidanceMoverManager)
